nodes.text: The G2 was a model of grenade manufactured by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc. that was avaliable during the Galactic Civil War. It caused damage using over-pressure shockwaves rather than shrapnel, baradium or incendiary chemicals. Its closest competitor was Baktoid Personal Ordnance's BKX-4 "Shockwave" grenade.

The G2 was first mentioned in Fully Operational, a 2018 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion game. It originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the 2014 Star Wars: Edge of the Empire supplement Dangerous Covenants.
